data.name: Morán misión
data.desc: Dominican fray Francisco Morán attempts to reduce Manche Chol Mayas but fails
data.note:
1640 Fray Moran travels fm Vera Paz [Guat] to Bacalar in search of runaway Maya /v Graham 161 /[missg]
 5 Mar 1643 Bishop of Yuc informs Sp Crown SE Yuc reduced in 6 pueblos 'hasta 130 familias' /v Barke B 50 /MEXICO,369 [Folder 3, Mérida a 5 mar 1643, ff 529r-531v]
